content:
Hello,

The attached items are submitted for a block vote for the Da Vinci PCT (Patient Cost Transparency) IG. These are all January 2022 Ballot Reconciliation tickets ready for FM vote based on the community consensus building process, which occurs on the open Friday PCT calls.

You may withdraw any item from the block vote by responding to this thread with the specific Key for the item you wish to withdraw. The Block vote will be scheduled for the FM call on 4/12/2022.

The following is a link to JIRA for Block-Vote-2 which contains the same attached 30 ballot comments: https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16938

This will also be emailed to the FM listserv.

Thank you
PCT-Block-Vote-2.docx

@Pat Taylor @Joan Harper @MaryKay McDaniel @Corey Spears @Linda @Celine A Lefebvre @Sakshi Mittal @Sam Undine @Eric Haas

Larry,

Pat and I have reviewed and request the following changes:

FHIR-36316 – We request this ticket be pulled and resolved it once the transaction flow is confirmed in FHIR-34952 and the solution can be holistically considered with FHIR-35063, which describes polling.

FHIR-34953 – We request that this ticket be pulled and resolved once the transaction flow is confirmed in FHIR-34952

FHIR-34926 – We request that this ticket be pulled and the resolution changed to “persuasive with mod” to include the language provided by Denise from the comments.

@Pat Taylor
@Larry Decelles Please pull FHIR-35199 as the resolution of FHIR-34953 is linked to this ticket @Sam Undine

Hello All,

Jira tickets:

FHIR-36316
FHIR-34953
FHIR-34926
FHIR-35199

have been pulled from Block-Vote-2.

Regards,
Larry

https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=16938

@Pat Taylor @Joan Harper @MaryKay McDaniel @Corey Spears @Linda @Celine A Lefebvre @Sakshi Mittal @Sam Undine @Eric Haas

@Larry Decelles Thank you.

Please pull FHIR-35532 - Resolution calls out defining a Value Set ‘'All-CPT-HCPCS' or 'CPT-HCPCS-all'’. Request the Value Set be named USClaim-Professional-productOrService-Codes to keep the same pattern defined in FHIR-35531, USClaim-Institutional-productOrService-Codes.

FHIR-35208 – clarify if resolution includes only the comment on 3/10 or the additional comment on 3/11

FHIR-35259, FHIR-34963 and FHIR-34786. The resolution of these tickets are dependent on the resolution of FHIR-35058 and then on FHIR-34965.

@Sam Undine

Pat Taylor said:

Larry Decelles Thank you.

Please pull FHIR-35532 - Resolution calls out defining a Value Set ‘'All-CPT-HCPCS' or 'CPT-HCPCS-all'’. Request the Value Set be named USClaim-Professional-productOrService-Codes to keep the same pattern defined in FHIR-35531, USClaim-Institutional-productOrService-Codes.

FHIR-35208 – clarify if resolution includes only the comment on 3/10 or the additional comment on 3/11

FHIR-35259, FHIR-34963 and FHIR-34786. The resolution of these tickets are dependent on the resolution of FHIR-35058 and then on FHIR-34965.

Sam Undine

Hello All,

Jira tickets:

FHIR-36316
FHIR-34953
FHIR-34926
FHIR-35199

FHIR-35532
FHIR-35208
FHIR-35259
FHIR-34963
FHIR-34786

have been pulled from Block-Vote-2.

Regards,
Larry
